The skirt is larger that expected, but, the top is shorter than I expected.

STYLE:  This little sleeveless outfit has a super short cropped top and a higher-waist midi-length skirt

PRO's:  -  Unbeatable low price
  -  Sexy style
  -  Stretches to fit
CON's:  - The fabric is very thin, so the material is very sheer - especially in white.
  -  If you have a little extra tummy or a 'muffin top' there is NO WAY to hide it in this outfit, especially in lighter colors.

THE DETAILS
The sizing is a bit odd.  I ordered both a Medium and the Large, and the Medium was a better fit. I am 5' 8 1/2 tall, weigh 148 lbs (174 cm, 66 kg),very  curvy build with small waist. I normally wear a 34D bra and size 8 clothes. The top was short in both the Medium and the Large, but the Size M made "the girls" look perkier, whereas is the Size L top just kind of hung there and did not lay flat. In both sizes the skirt fit almost the same - its stretchy but the medium accentuated my smaller waist and curvy hips more. (About what to wear underneath, if anything: I did not like the too-bare look of the white fabric on me, so I did a skin-tone Vic Sec bra under the Medium top, and skintone sheer boy shorts under the skirt.{ I will order the Black next, so that one will probably have more coverage and not require so much thought to what to wear under the outfit.}

FIT/SHAPE SUGGESTIONS:  This outfit looks best on curvy, hourglass or pear shape figures. You need a little bit of hips to make it look anything like the model's picture. The top is very short, so be prepared to show some skin if you're taller than 5'4" or more.

SIZE SUGGESTIONS:
Stretchy fabric means the outfit could fit a range of sizes.
- MEDIUM: Could Fit sizes 6 ,8, or 10 if small waists,  Fits about Bra Sizes B, C, or D cup.
-  LARGE:  Fits sizes 8, 10, 12 or maybe a 14 with no muffin top. Fits Bra Sizes up to 36 C,D, DD  or 34 DDD

THIS OUTFIT IS PERFECT FOR:  It's sexy but casual. Works great for Summer Events, "White Parties", Pool Parties, Nightclubs
summary: SEXY, SPORTY, STUNNING - but sheer in the white

reviewText: When ordering this dress please listen to the reviews of others when choosing what size to get. This dress runs a tad bit big so I ordered a size smaller that what I am. I was a bit confused as the pattern on the skirt is facing the front and the same pattern that is on the crop top is located on the back. It shows just the right amount of stomach area, as I have had 4 children and I have a couple of stretch marks, but even wit this outft I was able to cover that right on up. You can pull the skirt up or down to adjust, and it stil will look right. Also the color was a bit off, the red has a orange-ish tint to it. This did not bother me, as I purchased to wear for my mothers birthday dinner/party and her theme color was orange so it worked well. I will be purchasing another in black this time. The packaging was very put together and arrived in a timely manner as well.  Hope this review helps as this was a very great purchase that I do not regret. reviewText:
Junk, stay away.

Kit is extremely small.  Case measures only 7"x4" and is not leather as it appeared to be, a cheap vinyl.  Polish came in black and a neutral clear, no brown polish present.  Started to polish my first shoe with the neutral and immediately noticed it was a very poor quality polish.  Used the foam brush, and before I could get to my second shoe, the foam had torn and separated from the wood handle.  I then used the horsehair brush (which is not horsehair, but instead is a synthetic bristle) to remove the polish, and due to a cheap polish, left residue all over my shoes.  I threw the kit away, aside from the two small bristle brushes which may come in handy to clean a shoe or other household item, and will reorder another higher quality product.

Waste of money and time.  Do it right, buy something of higher quality, like all things in life, you get what you pay for.  Then again, I didn't get even close to what I paid for on this junk.  You have been warned.
summary: WARNING, READ BEFORE WASTING MONEY AND TIME

I really wanted a leather wallet with RFID blocking technology that also has a little flap to hold my drivers license. Also, I was always paranoid that some thief would either lift my credit card info while I was at a hockey game (its happened to people I know, and I attend a lot of hockey games) or that my credit cards would someway manage to fall out of my old wallet.  So because of this, I decided to purchase this RFID blocking leather wallet from Protectif. The wallet arrived by the estimated delivery date, and was packaged inside of a sleek looking black box adorned with the Protectif logo. The wallet is a classic leather bi-fold style design with the Protectif logo embossed on the bottom right corner. The wallet has a license flap (which can hold credit cars on both sides of the flap as well as underneath it) along with a 2 part divided section for your cash. I like that the cash section of the wallet is divided, as I find this very useful for separating money to put toward certain purchases. When you open up the wallet you're greeted with a classy embossed Protectif logo. Directly above the logo are a few tight slots to store a few credit/business cards securely.

When your fold or bend the wallet you can sort of feel and hear that there is certainly some kind of material under the leather (I am assuming that it is the RFID blocking material) lining the outside of the wallet. In this technologically advanced day and age, having the added piece of mind  and protection that this wallet delivers is most definitely worth the money to me.

My Final Verdict : In general, this RFID blocking leather bi-fold style wallet from Protectif does everything that I need a wallet to do for me. The wallet holds all of my credit cards and cash securely while hopefully blocking RFID signals from thieves. The wallet feels pretty well made at an exceptionally reasonable price. I would recommend this Protectif wallet to anyone looking for a leather bi-fold wallet with RFID blocking technology.

Please note : I have not yet tested the wallet to see if it actually does indeed block RFID signals as its intended to I just had to throw that out there. Im taking the other reviewers word that the wallet actually does block RFID signals.

I could test this quite easily by placing my office door opener inside it and trying to use it - normally the key card is detected from inside any leather wallet I use - even when buried inside bills. But when I put they key card in this wallet, even with only the outer shell of the wallet between it and the reader, it did not open the door. Once out of the bag, box and tissue paper, revealed is a really mice brown leather wallet that is not the softest or smoothest of leather, however it is perfectly manufactured. Having a number of slots for cards, a flap which separates and protects both sides of the wallet, and a slot for monetary bills, you can feel the liner which gives an additional somewhat stiff texture to the wallet. reviewText: This is a beautiful leather wallet with excellent workmanship. The stitching is impeccable, and I do love the way it folds out in a tri-fold formation for excellent convenience. If you have been shopping around for a wallet that will make your credit cards "invisible" to electronic pick-pockets, you won't go wrong with this one. (Yes, we do live in a very strange world!) It is described as a wallet for men, but there is really nothing here to suggest that a woman wouldn't enjoy using this quality leather piece, as well. It is classic in design, and I did receive a sample for review. Definitely recommended.

Combing high end leather styling with the security of RFID blocking technology... this wallets really has it all at a great price. If you find the video and review helpful...please hit the YES button below this review. Thanks! This wallet comes packed in a nice gift box that is very suitable to give straightaway as a gift to a loved one. Identity theft is on the rise, and many more people are using technology to swipe your information that is stored on newer credit cards that use RFID chips. This wallet uses built in protection to help defend your personal information from being stolen while your cards are in this wallet. That wallet is very well made using a great grade of leather. The design affords a very slim and compact wallet design. It is very smooth, and has a wonderful leather smell. It feels very high quality in your hand. You can't beat the value for the price.

This review is for the Protectif RFID blocking bi-fold leather wallet for men.  The stated technical purpose of this wallet is to thwart identity and credit card thieves from using RFID scanners to read vital personal information from new credit cards that contain the RFID chip.  Attached are pictures to reference my notes and review of this wallet.

I received this wallet in a very nice presentation box.  There are no markings of country of manufacture anywhere on the box, and the only printing anywhere on the wallet is the stamped name, "Protectif" both on the outside and inside lower corner.  Overall impressions right from the start are that of a high quality leather wallet that will last many years.  Protectif technology against reading RFID chips is buried somewhere in the wallet, and not visible or destroying the outside visible appeal.  RFID blockers use something called Faraday technology that essentially foil the ability of electronic readers to affect or even see what's on the other side.  Getting this into a wallet will increase the cost of the wallet, but compared to what losing your credit card information can do, it's not much.

Opening the box, one of the first things you notice is the great smell of leather.  Single stitching is found around the perimeter and well matched with the color of the wallet.  Stitching is further bolstered in corners where the greatest potential for wear and abuse occur.  Inside the wallet, there is room for up to 8 credit cards, though I suspect that with some effort, at least a few of the slots could manage to hold more than one.

On the left side is a fold over flap with a window pocket in it designed for driver's license or ID.  Fold it out to present it to a clerk, then back in and again and close the wallet when you're done.

The inside of the back of the wallet where the bills go is lined with a vinyl fabric and it has a bill separator to allow you to keep large denominations separate from smaller ones or as I do it, to keep receipts that I need separate from bills.

I typically look for cons for every product or at least things that I think some people may not care for.  I can't find anything that even picky people wouldn't care for.  Overall, I would highly recommend the product and as a man, suggest that it's one of those gifts that you're pretty safe on for most of us.  Even if we have one that's relatively new, it is still something that we know we will eventually need.  And with the RFID protection, there are probably few people that already have one in their pocket.

I received a free coupon for a complimentary sample provided so that I could test and evaluate the product.  However, I was not asked nor do I offer to write reviews that do not reflect my opinion and I don't recommend products that I would not buy. This is not a barter arrangement. I have no financial or personal connection with anyone selling this product or their employees.
summary: Premium leather wallet with built in RFID theft protection

reviewText:
I received a free item to review.

It's more attractive with a softer-texture than my last synth-leather wallet that barely lasted three months before the bottom fell out - literally. The bottom seam of the main bill compartment just tore all across. This wallet is reinforced at that natural stress point so I wouldn't expect a similar tear.

A problem with the RFID shielding of course is it doesn't just shield credit cards. I use an ID card swipe throughout my workplace at least 7-8 times a day - often more if I'm using a particular lab. Without having to open my old wallet I could gently pat it against the reader with the ID in any inner pocket and it would be read.

I have to open this wallet for the ID to be read. It's possible to place the ID in the clear flap pocket and wrap it around inside the main bill compartment, or worse, just place the ID in the bill compartment. But neither is optimal: the ID sticks out and it makes inserting/removing money awkward. Either way I feel I'm more likely to lose the ID.

But other than that, it's an attractive, comfortable wallet, with adequate pockets and I'll probably just get use to flipping it open.
summary: Nice, But Surprise If You Use A Card Swipe

reviewText:
This is a nice wallet, and I think it's worth the selling price. Even if it did not block thieves from electronically stealing your credit card and I.D. information, it would still be a nice wallet. Soft, genuine leather. Nice stitching, well constructed, and, for me, the right number of sleeves and places to put things. A wallet is a very personal, utilitarian thing, and everybody has different needs. I want easy access to my credit cards, licenses, and I.D.s, and I have nine of these. My driver's license I place in the flip-out holder with the clear window and the eight others I put in the facing sleeves. Behind the sleeves are two hidden compartments. I use these for registrations, fishing licenses and other things I don't take out very often.

I was offered this item as a gift for purposes of testing and reviewing, and I can honsetly say I would have passed had the wallet not been made with the exact number of sleeves and pockets I require. Functionally, this wallet is a duplicate to the one I've been using for twenty years, and until now, I've been unable to find a one to replace it. It's surpising how many very nice wallets are made that can only hold money and two or three credit cards.

If you're like me, and you want a nice, leather wallet than can hold eight cards and a license, this one is worth trying.
summary: Perfect Upgrade for My Twenty Year Old Wallet

reviewText: When I was a child, Pokemon first came onto the scene. It burst into our lives, took over our schools and everyone had to have the latest card and have watched the latest episodes, or you just weren't cool! I didn't like Pokemon because everyone else did though, it was something that I really, truly enjoyed! Now that I'm a 27 year old wife and mother of 3, I mostly put my love for Pokemon behind me. Even though I'm not a kid anymore, Pokemon has always been something I loved, and I even still watched the shows and kept my old Pokemon cards (First Edition Holo Charizard over heeerrrreeee!!! LOL!). One day, I was going through my book shelf and pulled out my old binders, filled to the brim with Pokemon cards. Our two oldest kids (a girl, age 9 & a boy, age 7) saw me flipping through the pages and asked what the heck was I doing. I sat down, pulled them close and said "Let me tell you about a magical world called "Pokemon"." Their ears perked up and their eyes grew wide as I described what it was all about, showing them my cards in between. By the end, they were in love, just as much as I had been! They wanted to watch the show right away! Amazon Prime pulled up the first season, and we sat down for one long marathon! Ever since that day, everything is about Pokemon! I think they enjoy it more than I did (gasp!!)!!! So, naturally, our son wanted a Pokemon themed birthday, and this was one of his gifts. The box is so real looking, it seems as if it jumped right out of the show! When he slowly opened the lid, the sun shown down and lit up the badges. His eyes grew as big as plates and he started screaming! We told him that because of his many Pokemon battles and his great love for each and every Pokemon creature, the Pokemon League has awarded him with the Official Indigo League Badges! He lost all touch with reality and completely lost it! He wanted nothing else than to pin each and every badge on his jacket, and for the rest of the day, he showed ANYONE and EVERYONE his badges, telling everyone about who each Gym Leader was, what Pokemon they had, what they looked like and how hard they were to beat. It's been over a month since his birthday, and he still loves them dearly. He cherishes them beyond words. Something so simple as this, has meant so much to him! As for the product itself, they are amazing! The professional look, right down to the box was unreal. I was NOT expecting that. Each pin was perfect and the colors were very true to what the badges look like. The pin backs have stayed on as well, nothing was loose and the backs are nice and tight. I plan on buying the next badge set for our daughter when her birthday comes around next year, cause ya know, she's totally green eyed on this one! Overall, if you're a big Pokemon fan that's around my age, or just wanting to gift these to a kid you love, you will not be disappointed and neither will the person you're giving these to. I hate to admit it, but I'm even considering buying a set for myself! I promise, I'm a fully functioning adult lol
summary: Great gift for ANY Pokemon lover!!

Holy cow- this thing is TIGHT. I'm not complaining- it's supposed to fit snug, right?? I ordered a size medium. When I first tried putting it on, I thought "no way" is this going to fit. As a reference point, I am 5'10 150lbs with an hourglass shape. I had to go up one hook at a time.
Whew this thing is SNUG! It's tight but not uncomfortable. Standing = feels fine. Sitting down is a whole different story! It definitely does not allow slouching that's for sure. I see why people say these things correct posture.
Will it slim my waist? Only time will tell. I am fairly physically fit, but of course want to see if this would aid in shedding a couple of inches. I will update my review in a few months. Side note-- since I'm so tall, I was worried about this fitting my long torso-- it's actually longer than expected. Put it this way- if I wanted to wear a black skirt with a black bra for Halloween or whatever, there wouldn't be any bare midriff or exposed skin.  Overall, I am satisfied! reviewText: Love these -- retro 80s, knit ties.  My son started a new trend!

I love, love, love these ties. 3 ties for this price. AMAZING. If you are looking for a traditional neck tie, these ties are not for you. While there is nothing wrong, and perfectly fine with purchasing and wearing these ties for you day to day job, in my opinion, these ties are more appropriate for after work drinks, a causal weekend out, or a date. These particular ties are for someone wanting to make a statement. Trust me, you will get looks when wearing these ties, not because the patterns are crazy, but because you don't see many flat are knitted ties.
The quality of these ties is great and I really like the wide selection of colors, however, I wish I could choose the colors I wanted. With such a large selection, it was hard to narrow down the set that I wanted. There seemed to always be a set that had one color that I did not particularly care for. Did I mention I LOVED these ties?

If you are looking to distinguish yourself from all other tie wears, I recommend these ties.

Bought these for my husband. He loves them. He has several solid knit ties already and he was especially excited by the patterns in these ties. He immediately assumed I had spent five times more than I actually paid for them, of course I did not correct them. He had a lot of fun matching them up with suits and shirts. He received lots of compliments when he wore the black one, he hasn't wore the others yet.

 I received these ties at a discount in exchange for my honest review and opinion.

This is a very nice set of unique ties that are sure to attract some positive attention.  I purchased set called The Guy Next Door and really like the selection.  Theres a green tie with horizontal blue stripes, a blue tie with red diamonds, and a mixed-tone grey tie as well.  Within this set alone, there are a couple nice options from something that will grab a little more attention to something a little more neutral and subtle.  There are also other sets with different colors and styles so there is something for everyone.

The apparent overall quality of the tie in general is also impressive.  The knitting seems good and tight, the stitching seems good and theres also a silky panel where they tie would go around the neck which is a nice feature and should help the tie slip on and be tightened or loosened more easily.

For the price (less than $6 for each tie), this is a great way to shake up your wardrobe and try something new.

I received a discount on the purchase price of knit ties in exchange for my honest review. I do not let the fact that I receive a discount on a product keep me from pointing out any negative aspects.
summary: An affordable way to try something new without sacrificing quality

reviewText:
I ordered and received the: BMC Stylish 3pc Mixed Pattern Mens Fashion Knitted Neck Tie Accessory Set Thanks to Amazon prime It only took about two days for the product to arrive. The shipping packaging was a discreet flat box which I find to be critical in case the package is just left on your doorstep. The actual packaging of the product was a plastic bag (picture attached) and then each individual tie was wrapped in its own plastic as well. I really like the style of the sock tie, and the knitted material only adds on to it. The quality of the material seems to be pretty good. Heck for this price, you're pay $5 a tie. Go to a boutique shop and you're looking at closer to $50 for a tie of this style. The colors are also just as advertised so you know what you're getting, before you get it. Ive also added photos of the three that I received. This is the guy next door package. Overall I cant wait to be able to wear these ties out. I know they will make a bold statement!

I did receive this product at a reduced rate for testing purpose in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion. If you feel this helped in deciding whether to purchase or not, up vote the review. Thanks!

Amazing deal for $16!!! Got the Guy Next Door set (not sure why they gave these names to them) and am very happy with the purchase. Super stylish and affordable! Some specifics:

What I like:
- Price. Appx. $5 per tie. Even just to add some variety to your wardrobe, this is awesome!
- Quality. Seems to be really good! Its not the best material as far as I can tell, but it definitely doesnt feel like the cheapest material out there. Theyve got some weight to them, so they wouldnt just go flapping around in the wind. Among the ones I got in the Guy Next Door set, the green one was the lightest and seemed the flimsiest. The other two are solid.
- Looks. They are pretty much exactly as pictured (the photos included on amazon are very detailed and helpful)

What I don't like:
- Id have to nit-pick here, really. So I wont!

Over all, such a good deal for $16. Perfect for less-formal situations in which you still want to look fresh. Give them a go!

reviewText: Perfect case to keep amazing glasses protected!
Great case! Stylish and fits my browlines perfectly. Came with a cleaning cloth that works better than most I've purchased elsewhere. Love the case and would order again.

Feeling very let down on this purchase.

This was the 2nd case that I have purchased from these folks.

Previous History: The first purchase I ever made from them was for a set of their readers. I gave them a 5 star review praising them.

The second purchase was for another set of their readers in case they ever went out of business. That's how much I liked their product! Their readers are definitely the best I have ever purchased in over 25 years of using them. I just told my wife a couple of days ago that I'll probably need more powerful lenses before these glasses die.

After receiving the first set of readers, I ordered a case to protect them. The case (1st time ordering one) was absolutely perfect in fit and finish, literally. I was once again very impressed by their workmanship and quality control. Another 5 star review from me.

Then I received the second case that I ordered a few days ago. I had really thought that this outfit was the epitome of quality construction before I received this case.

Unfortunately, the top and bottom pieces don't seat properly. This should have certainly been noticed before it was sent out the door.

I played with it for a while and it looks better. However, since I was squeezing it and forcing it out of its initial fit, Im sure it won't stay this way forever.

I was very disappointed in this particular item. I see that it is reverting back to its previous fit after only 24 hours or so. Since it looks somewhat better now (temporarily) I cant be bothered returning it. I just feel let down.

I will still order readers from them when the time comes, but only one set at a time.

P.S. I HAD to select "Fit as expected" since the top and bottom are the correct sizes, they just don't fit together.
summary: Feeling very let down on this purchase

It is a nice and professional looking case, I just wish it was thinner and not scuffed up.

reviewText:
Do not purchase this belt. I was really excited to finally have a belt that I could adjust to my exact size, but I was extremely disappointed by this purchase for a two reasons.
1) the mechanism to allow the belt to release to take it off is very fickle... It's take some fidgeting around and a bunch of tries with it to get it to fully push down and release. It was extremely frustrating to take on and off even after just trying it on for the first time.
2) the product looks nothing like the picture shown here. The buckle in the photo looks to be shiny and a nice metal; all and all sharp looking with straight edges. That's not what the belt actually looks like. In actuality, the belt buckle is a bit curved around the sides, detracted from the sharp appearance you might be looking for in a belt. In addition, the metal has a dull and nearly shineless finish.
All in all it was a very bad purchase and I regret spending any money on this belt. I don't know the company's return policy, but I will certainly reach out to them to try to find out if I can return this belt and get my money back...

To follow up - The company was extremely gracious and fully reimbursed me for my purchase. They were super nice and a pleasure to speak to. I admit that it could have been that I received a faulty belt since their mechanisms do usually work according to most of the reviews. So based on their amazing customer service, I actually think this product deserves two more stars since I imagine the product is usually better than the one I received and they are so easy and good to work with.
summary: Product wasn't as expected. However, the company is amazing!

This is my favorite purse of all time!  This is such a special purse, I keep being stopped by strangers asking how to get one.  I am frequently asked if I made it myself because it is so unique!  The people I know keep saying, "That is so YOU that I can't believe you didn't make it yourself!"  I had one woman stop me in a busy store and ask me to help her find it on Amazon on her phone right there, where she actually purchased it while standing beside me in the store. I feel like a walking advertisement for this purse, but it is honestly the best purse EVER.  There are two straps-- a shoulder strap and a cross-body strap.  Both are made of the rainbow leather.  Not only is it well constructed and beautiful, I love the pockets on the inside, too. There are two zippered pockets with a sleeve in between them, and the large cavity of the purse remains open, allowing me to carry a scarf, gloves, hat, and even my big camera with me on cold wintry sight-seeing days. :)  The best part for me living overseas with the military is this seller ships to APO!  If you are on the fence about whether you should buy this purse or not, and if you love color and fringe and unique accessories, then this is the purse for you and you should not hesitate to buy it right now.

If you are wearing a suit, sports coat or overcoat, this is the perfect fit for an inner pocket to any of the afore mentioned.  Can handle credit cards, check book and register and even passport and travel documents.  Just don't put it in your rear pocket.  Overseas pickpockets will have it in seconds.

reviewText: These are well worth the money. The pocket for bills is probably 1/4" so it has plenty of room. I love the distressed look and that smell of the leather. Made very well. Check these out in a western store and they'll run between $40 & $60

I've only had my Crazy Horse leather wallet a short time, but I am pleased with it so far.  The leather is quite nice and the fit, trim, and stitching seem to be top notch.  All of the card pockets do accept standard size credit/debit/membership cards.  The various pockets behind the card slots make it easy to organize things for easy access.  I have no way of testing the RFID blocking claim, so we'll have to take that on faith.

This wallet is available in two colors.  Do note that the styes are different as well.  The arrangement of the pockets in one style may suit your purposes better than the other.  I carry only one credit card, two debit cards and a bunch of membership cards.  For me this arrangement allows me to keep my credit/debit cards on the right and my membership cards together on the left, as well as a see-through pocket for my ID.

Also on the left are two long, thin pockets perfect for carrying paper currency, receipts, and checks needing to be deposited.

Under the card pockets on the right is a zippered pocket.  It may be intended for coin, but that does not work out well as it's hard to dig out and gets bulky fast.  I use it for a few of my business cards and a spare key (flat metal key, not a bulky plastic transponder key) in case I lock my keys in the truck (again).

Under that is a deep pocket that works well for carrying a pad of checks and the register as well as a small notebook.

The only thing I could not get to work in here was my pocket calendar: the pages are a bit too wide.  I may be able to find a smaller calendar that will work, but I'll have to leave the pad of checks at home to make room.  Most businesses accept debit cards, so I probably don't need checks anymore anyway.

The only warning I'd offer is that the oiled leather is slightly tacky, so if you normally inhabit a dusty or dirty environment, that debris will stick to the leather.  That may diminish over time.  Also, the leather does scar up if it's rubbed against things, but that is stated in the product description, and only adds character to the wallet.
summary: An Attractive Wallet That Doubles as an Organizer

 I cannot say I have a big or small head, however, all other hats I've bought fit just right.

* The locking mechanism is faulty.  One loses grip when one takes off cap (when scratching head or readjusting position; backwards/forward)
* I like to wear mine backwards depending on the outfit.  It looks worse when I do wear it so.

I do like the design style and material.  For the above reasons I would not recommend to those who already are aware of having a 'regular' sized head or large one, of course.

I have a pretty high tolerance for bad quality/workmanship. I can usually zhush something into looking decent and carry it so no one's the wiser. This thing was a travesty. Number 1, there's a large paper lens protector that's sewn over the lens. It serves a pretty major purpose in protecting the lens, but the fact that it's made from paper makes it difficult to remove and likely that you'll accidentally scratch or damage the lens when tearing it off. Number 2, the "piping" has excess that wasn't trimmed. (As seen in the photo) Typically, I wouldn't consider this a huge flaw, but after realizing the next point, I'm definitely including this. Number 3, they put a warning sticker on the actual lens. This isn't some easy pull and peel thing you'd typically see. No, it's a full adhesive sticker. Sure, I could've tried goo gone or soap and water, but honestly I'm afraid I'd somehow damage it more. Promptly requesting a return. Do yourself a favor and avoid this monstrosity.

This is a great produce idea in theory, but this is just not sturdy enough to packaged and shipped the way it is. The visor comes with a plastic film on one side and a paper cover on the other side, and you WILL scratch or otherwise damage the product in the process of removing these coverings (that is if your visor doesn't come already damaged with a crease in the plastic from being shipped with heavier items, like mine did).

If you have a chance to buy one of these with the protective film/paper covering already removed, in a situation where you can inspect the visor before purchase (like a B&M store), jump on it. This is definitely a nicely big visor that REALLY protects your face from the sun. But don't trust that your visor will arrive un-damaged, and don't trust that you can unpackage it without breaking it yourself.

Good bra. Hard to know what is going to fit the best for nursing when your own size changes quite a bit and when you're buying something online you haven't been able to try on. These did fit as expected. I got the small and I'm normally a 34B, now a 36C (in first month of nursing). I really really like that these have removeable cup inserts. Sometimes they add a little extra support and cushion (which was awesome for my tender, sore breasts as I got used to breastfeeding), they also make them "modest" enough to wear out and about. Yet, if it's a little too much, especially since I'm also using thick reusable nursing pads to absorb any leakage, I can remove the extra pad. These seem to be of quality material. The band does stretch out a little bit. I would recommend buying either your normal band size or a band size slightly smaller than your fullest nursing size so that they continue to fit as you settle into your flow. I simply bought some bra extenders that clip onto the back of the bra for the days when I was very big and then as the bra stretched out a little and as I adjusted post-partum, I was able to downsize without needing to buy a whole new bra.

reviewText:

reviewText:
I have passed my days of spending $200 on sunglasses to lose or break them months later. The design is simple and attractive. They do not feel "cheap" at all, they are very comfortable on and they look good! I love the wood detailed arms. I got the blue this time, my next purchase will be the clear. You really cannot go wrong with these.

summary: This is such a fun package. The sunglasses are dark enough and polarized

reviewText: These sunglasses are built strong. They came with a nice case and a lens cloth. Also included was a wristband and a guitar pick for some reason. Very happy with the purchase. I received this item at a discount in exchange for an honest review.
Very nice, will definitely buy another pair.
Awesome.

I thought that these sunglasses looked pretty cool in the picture, but after getting them in my hands I have to say that the picture doesn't do them justice.

The red color is vibrant and the wood tones really offset the red making them look bright, fun, and beachy. The polarized lenses are also great and I can see so much better when driving than I could with the sunglasses that I already had. I could even see the shatter-proofing in my windows in my cars when wearing these sunglasses, which I thought was pretty cool.

The case that comes with them is also nice for keeping them protected and safe, plus it looks great. As a nice added touch these came with a guitar pick, which my husband promptly stole, and a gel-like bracelet with the company's name and an American flag.

I hope these aren't a pair of sunglasses that I lose because I love them!

Update: I now also own the blue color of these glasses and I love them just as much. The blue is bright, but not obnoxious and it contrasts well with the wood, just like with the red glasses.  The tint is just right and I love the polarization and how well it cuts glare. If I could get all the colors I definitely would.

Disclaimer:  I received this product for a discounted rate in return for my honest and unbiased review. All opinions are 100% my own and no further compensation was received.

As a warning to women who have small faces, these may be too big for you, but they are perfect on me and I love them! I've attached a few pictures to show the details and colors. As that radio spot for the San Diego zoo says, these are totes bananas!

This are even better then I could have expected. The design is unique so cool factor is certainly there.

The lens are polarized and do a great job blocking out the rays they are suppose to. The overall build is SOLID. I would put these up against any of the major brands that sell for 5x as much. The wood part of the frame that goes around the ear is more a composite that is strong and smoothly finished with a coating for comfort.

For the money they are a must, for the design they are a must, and for days in the sun they are a must.

SIZE: wanted to comment on the size as that is always tricky online. I am a 6 foot man and have a slightly thicker head ( that is size not other kind of thick head) and these are perfect. I would say they are on the larger side especially if you are a women. But my wife but them on and they look great on her to. So these are good so long as you don't want slim and slender sporty glasses.

I received these glasses at a discount in hopes for an honest review. The above is my true experience and with these I will be ordering another pair at full price.

reviewText: I was impressed with the reviews of this sunglasses and decided to get them for the next summer. After arriving I open them and everything was there as promised. The cloth, the pick and the glasses. The thing that I liked was that even though light they felt sturdy. The lenses were polarized and protective against the sun rays. I have weak eyes and I always have problem with the sun but with this glasses I felt comfortable.  The 2 things that I didn't like was that the bamboo arms were a little bit too wide but that is not an issue, the real issue was that when I start cleaning the lenses I felt the lenses moving freely inside the frame. The lenses are smaller and does not fit the frame which makes them loose, I worry that if the plastic heat up under the sun it will make them even looser and when the sand wedges inside the crevices it will damage the frame and the lenses. But for that price I can deal with it.

I am a woodies girl hands down. I have a few pairs of the all wood woodies and I enjoy these hybrids as well. Great quality and great price.

I'm very impressed by the quality and packaging of these glasses. So let's talk about what's included:

-A nice black hard-shell case for carrying the glasses and included accessories.
-Rubber wrist bracelet branded with Woodies and an American flag
-Woodies-branded microfiber cleaning cloth
-Guitar pick (which I forgot to include in the picture)
-And finally, the glasses.

The glasses are of very high quality.  I love the feel of the wood on the temples and the clear plastic of the frame goes very well with the bamboo.  The polarized lenses are not too dark and effectively block out annoying glare.  All in all, I'm very happy with this product (which I received at discount for an honest review).

These sunglasses are a good buy! The bamboo sides make them stylish and stand out from other glasses that have a similar shape to them. I was worried that the bamboo might be rough, but they're well-finished and had no sharp or rough areas to them. Overall, they're very comfortable to wear and provide adequate protection from the sun.

The only issue I have with these are the polarized lenses. I don't typically use polarized lenses, and everything reflective looks extra "shiny" while using them. Mostly it's a problem with metal and glass objects, but also my phone screen. When looking at the phone with these on, all sorts of weird colors appear, like you're looking at it through a prism. I'm sure this is all personal preference though, and I'd probably get used to it after using them more.

Overall, if you're looking for something affordable, stylish, comfortable to wear, and don't mind polarized lenses, these are the glasses for you!

reviewText:

The lenses in these glasses are very dark.  So dark that when I tried to look at myself in the mirror when I was inside with them on it was hard to tell what the glasses looked like.  The lighting is pretty low inside my house however, so all sunglasse are too dark for inside.  The glasses are great for cutting the sunlight though.  My eyes are pretty sensitive to sunlight so I really like these when Im outside - they keep me from squinting so much which is great.

I really appreciate that these glasses come with a case since Im always scratching up my glasses in my purse.  I also like that there is a cleaning cloth included - all the things you need to keep your sunglasses in good shape!  Im very happy with these glasses, and would consider getting more for my sisters, since I think they would love them too!

UPDATE
So 9 months after my initial review, I received an email from this company claiming that reviews are very important to them. While I am glad to hear them say that they take their reviews seriously, I was left wondering how much they actually care if it takes them 9 months to respond. Can't really be that important to them if it takes 9 months to address an issue (either that, or they had so many terrible reviews that they finally got to mine). reviewText:
This dress was absolutely beautiful in person. I mean, totally totally gorgeous. It's unbelievably flowy and silky, and the top portion from the mid-waist up is nice and fitting so it really accentuates your shape while still being flowy and forgiving in the hip area (my curvy area!!).

I'm 5'4 and 130lbs, I have a curvy hip/butt area and a medium bust. My goal is to lose about 5 lbs, so I got this in a small, and it actually already fits me really nicely. The only thing that you WILL notice, if you're around my height or shorter, is that this dress is WAY too long. I showed it off to my husband as soon as I got it and his first words were, "that would be really beautiful if you got it hemmed like half a foot!" And he was right, I was literally walking on the skirt, and had to hold it up to walk. I don't think heels would even help me. I'm going to get it hemmed about 5 inches, and it will be perfect. However, it's totally worth the alteration in my opinion! I would buy it again regardless.

I'll try to post pictures with an update before I get it hemmed. I plan to wear this on our honeymoon in Croatia, absolutely can't wait.

reviewText: I'm contemplating filling up my whole wardrobe with pants like these. They are soooo comfortable and they look great. And guess what else I just figure out? I can wear them in the winter because a long boot covers it. So it looks like I'm just wearing skinny jeans when really I'm wearing these comfy jean leggings. And they look FANTASTIC with the boots. Do yourself a favor and buy these!

I purchased these jeggings for my wife.  They work on most levels and would have been rated a four (4) if not for a few issues I had.  First, the jeggings are a bit longon my wife.  Long enough in fact, that they look like a pair of long pants versus capri's.  It would be nice to see these made in a petite for shorter women.  Second, I am not sure what the jeggings were treated in but it was not very pleasant.  The odor went away after I washed the jeggings.  Lastly, I would have liked the zipper and pockets to be legitimately functional. My wife has a pair that are similar to these jeggings that were functional.  Having everything work gives the pants a more authentic look and feel.  Again, I think the jeggings are nice but could  better if the manufacturer addresses the areas that I commented on here.  That having been said, overall, I would recommend these pants.

These jeggings just arrived today, and they fit me perfectly. They are such a pretty color of red, and go great with a top that I bought off of Amazon as well. These are the first pair of jeggings that I have ever owned, and my husband loves them on me. Got these because they were cheap, and I thought why not try it out.  Might as well.  Well, you might as well not.

They're not absolutely terrible, but they are definitely not great.  They fit, but they kind of stretch and slide down, which is really annoying.  They say they are jeggings, but they are so thin they might as well be leggings if not just thick tights.  There is really nothing jean-like about them except the 'design'.  The material is definitely not.

Some people have mentioned the odd positioning of the back pockets, and they are indeed odd, but I don't really care about that too much because I've been wearing them with long shirts, and good thing I did because I am currently wearing them to work and I just discovered a hole in the back, above one of the pockets, which I must have missed this morning.  That is pretty annoying because I've only worn them a few times since I got them, and always washed them with the delicate hand wash setting and hung them to dry, so they should certainly not be ripping already.

Anyway, I think I may keep them around just to wear under a dress for a pop of color, like all my other leggings.  This is probably all they're good for to begin with.  And I do like the shade of red.  Not too bright.

So buy at your own risk, you DO get what you pay for.  The $50 leggings I buy at Express last for years without ripping.  Guess they're worth it! Good to know.
summary: Crappy quality, but good as a legging to layer other stuff over

This is a very hard question to answer. If you order something and you accidentally get it in the right size then it fits  as expected.  However, you should be warned that you may order something in a large that fits exactly right, then order it in a different color and discover that you cannot get it over your hips. And vice versa. I have spent probably over $100 on these/this brand both from this vendor and others.  There is a HUGE problem with quality control. So be warned. If you just don't care. And money is no object, then by all means order them. If you accidentally get the right size they will fit nicely.  If fate wasn't with you, you will get something on wearable and how to send it back. (OR, if they ARE the right size, wash them a time or two and discover that holes appear everywhere in the fabric.) AGAIN, and again, and AGAIN!! My advice? Don't order them. Save yourself the annoyance.  The tags say "Yelete".  Any other vendors that sell this brand will be the same story.  Just DON'T.
summary: How DO THESE Fit??  Feel like playing Russian roulette? Then this is your Jegging!

reviewText: I purchased this tux for my son to wear to his prom. I measured my son per their description and emailed the measurements to them. I paid for expedited shipping because his prom was three weeks away.  The tux, which included the jacket, pants, vest, tie, and pocket square arrived in about ten days.  The navy blue was a nice deep matte shade, but it is not shiny in case you are looking for more sheen.  It fit my son perfectly.  It is "athletic cut" so the jacket is slim in the waist.  There was no wiggle room, so error on the larger side of your measurements.  The tux offered a nice classic look, and I am very pleased.  Good communication from the company. I will definitely order from this company again when he needs a tux or suit.

reviewText: These are not capri style - they are full length.

The fabric of these is not all that thick and is much more like higher quality opaque tights than cotton blend leggings (which I would have preferred).  However, for the price I do recommend this purchase.  I typically wear 10-12 pants and the L/XL fit exactly as I expected.  I do like the capri length and the spot where the leggings end is snug enough but not at all tight, which is nice.  They don't slide around or ride up.  Someone mentioned these being much nicer than expected and worthy of wearing to the gym...I honestly don't get that from these, even though they do provide good coverage I can't imagine wearing them as "pants" even with a longer tunic style top.  I do that with some leggings which are more cottony and similar to athletic shorts/pants, but these are definitely more like hosiery than pants.  The wide waistband and reinforced crotch bring these up to a 4 star rating from the 3 I probably would have rated them otherwise.  Many reviews mention a terrible chemical smell and I DID notice these had an odd smell right out of the package, but I wore them without washing (the first time) and they were fine, I didn't notice the smell while wearing and I have a pretty sensitive sense of smell.  Once they were washed and dried, it was gone (no Febreze or multiple washes were necessary for me).  All said, I like them and would probably order another color, even though they didn't blow me away either.
Ripped the first time I wore them

I normally wear a 3X in most brands and they generally fit loosely.  These would probably stretch to a size 14 or 16 but no where near a 1X let alone a 3X.  Otherwise, very nice.  I gave them to my sister-in-law.

The material is not nearly as thick as it looks in the photos... Maybe I should have known better after reading the materials it was made from, but I didn't expect them to be so sheer! And before you think I should have bought a bigger size to fit better, I'm normally a size L, and just to be safe I ordered the 3XL, because I'd rather have them be a little too roomy than look like a sausage stuffed into them! Still, you can VERY clearly see my underwear right through them... My butt may be big, but I'm pretty sure it's not 3XL big! They are very comfy, the quality seems very good, there is definitely a chemical smell, but it's not overpowering and after a few washes I don't think it'll be an issue. Overall, I don't regret buying them. I was hoping they'd be as thick as they appear to be in the photos, but I think that's more my fault than theirs. They'll be nice under a dress or a long tunic, but not something I'd wear without covering up a bit.

These arrived promptly and I put them on as soon as I opened the package.  The size I ordered fit me perfectly and I noticed that they were quite warm.  I sat in bed, got under the bankies, curled up and hardly even noticed I was wearing them.  They are textured and you will notice it when you walk in them, but it's not an unpleasant sensation, just one to think about if you're sensitive to textures, especially if your thighs brush past each other when you walk. I have not yet worn these out in the real world but so far I like them and I would probably order more and in different colors.

I have since worn these all day and I have come to another conclusion.  These fit and wear like tights, only they're footless, obviously.  I am 5'4/5'5 and these are not exactly capri length on me, they are mostly ankle length.  I still like the way they fit and I have worn them all day without any discomfort or irritation.  But they do feel like tights when you put them on and when you wear them.  So if you don't like the way tights feel between the thighs when walking, shorts might be suggested.  Also, wash before wearing.  I have noticed that they have a scent that is not pleasing to the nose.  This is a lesson I have learned the hard way.  I still like these and am changing my response from a 4 to a 5.

reviewText:
REVIEW UPDATE 9-17-18:

This bracelet is still CUTE but SUPER TARNISHED now after wearing it a few x per week.

Do NOT expect it to LAST for SURE!!

BIG disappointment!!!!!!

===============================

I ordered two of these bracelets (two different messages on them) & love them both!

This Hope for the Cure bracelet is beautiful!

I LOVE that these bracelets are adjustable to fit pretty much any wrist.  The charms are pretty, well cut (no rough spots), the text is centered on them, & they are super cute.  I'm sure some people may not care for two of the charms that came on mine ("handmade with love" is on one charm & "Made in the USA" is on the other charm.. I think they are both super cute charms & emphasize that they are handmade.  My daughter also likes them.) but they could be removed if desired.  We are leaving them on the bracelet because we like them in addition to the pink bead charm & the "Hope for the Cure" charm.

I think this makes a wonderful gift & I do recommend it.

In fact we like them so much I just purchased another one at full retail as a gift because we do like it so much.  I will buy more for my other daughters in the future & also some as gifts for my girls' best friends when their birthdays come around.

I will be ordering some additional charms to put on it as we are making a "purity" bracelet for one of our daughters to represent those things she is saving for marriage.  I read about the concept in a magazine.  If she decides to give away any of those "gifts" (she chooses what her own gifts are for herself, ex.first kiss) & if she decides to give it away before the time frame she decides upon (upon engagement, at the altar, etc.) then she is supposed to give that charm to the one she would give her gift to.  It is a wonderful reminder to help a young woman keep her eye on the prize when temptation may arise.  Our daughter loved the idea when she read about it & so I just surprised her with her bracelet now that she is a teen and will face more temptation as she gets older.

I received a discount on this product for the purpose of my honest review.

Don't worry, I have integrity & do NOT lie in my reviews whether I paid full price or received a discount!

I USED TO think that people who received discounts on reviewed products were all dishonest just trying to get freebies or cheap products for writing fluff-filled reviews whether they actually liked the product or not, but I have since found out how things work and I mostly disagree with that now. I can't say that some people don't do that, but I can say that my experience has been a good one & the way I find products is I look for things I NEED & WANT, so I almost always have knowledge about them before ordering something. If it is the first time I've used a certain product I disclose that also in my review. That knowledge gives me some advantage in writing my reviews because I know what to look for in a product, how it may compare to others, etc. & then I can write a fair, honest, & hopefully helpful review!

I know that Amazon reviews are helpful & so many people look at them to decide if they should purchase a product. I also know seeing so many reviews from certain products that seem like they are all from discounts or freebies can be deeply discouraging. Take heart & know that my experience has been that many of the reviewers genuinely want to give you a fair & honest review. Again, there are some who use a product once or twice & then write a glowing review, but I'm not talking about them. I'm talking about those who take the time to THOROUGHLY test a product before writing a review. They don't write reviews after 3 days of receiving a product just because someone may want them to pound out a bunch of reviews in 72 hours.

Feel free to ask me any questions. I will do my best to follow up if you do.

If you found my review candid & helpful, please click on the YES button below.

Thank you!

I love the look of Alex and Ani bracelets but I personally like the charms on a charm bracelet to reflect myself in someway. I have PCOS and the awareness ribbon color is the same as Ovarian Cancer so when I saw this bracelet, I knew I wanted the teal color beaded bracelet to wear for my own hope during my struggle with PCOS.

This cancer awareness bracelet is beautiful. It's adjustable so it should fit an array of wrist sizes, so you don't have to worry about it being too small. The charms are very sturdy, I don't expect them to weaken or break off. The bracelet is a little thin and might bend a little bit, but I know people who have real Alex and Ani bracelets that have bent. The beads are beautiful but they are a little lighter in color than I expected. While it was a teal color to me it was more of a light green than a bluish-green teal color.

I think this bracelet is perfect for anyone who has been affected by cancer in any capacity. I also think it makes a wonderful gift for anyone fighting or a survivor as a gesture of hope and it's perfect for anyone to show they support the battle against cancer. I will be buying another one of these bracelets in the dark purple for pancreatic cancer to wear in memory of my godmother who succumbed to that terrible disease.

The Cancer Awareness Bracelets made by Hidden Hollow beads are just fabulous and affordable. I love that a portion of the sale goes to the ACS. Not only are you getting a lovely piece of jewelry but you are also helping to fund the fight against cancer with your purchase. That is just wonderful.

I received this product at a discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review. These words, thoughts and opinions are entirely my own.

Cancer awareness is so important because cancer destroys the lives of many. I ordered this bracelet as a reminder of its importance, and because I thought the bracelet was really cute. When I received it, I was pleasantly surprised because it looked exactly as it is pictured. I went to put it on and it fit great. I will say, if my wrist was a little bigger, it probably would not have gone on, but it fits perfectly for me. I am big, so anyone smaller than me would have no problems with it at all. I wanted to try it out for a while before I left a review, because I have found with the slide band bracelets, the coloring starts to come off. That was not the case here. The coloring is still a vibrant silver. The charms are still vibrant as well. Overall this bracelet is a win!

**This review is for the Cancer Awareness (Hope for the Cure) Expandable Wire Bangle Bracelet**

My Mother-in-Law died a year ago from breast cancer, so this bracelet means a lot to me.  I think any type of awareness people can do to any type of cancer, illness or disease is great.  This bracelet is beautiful, elegant and dainty with a whole lot of meaning.

The bracelet is metal and it is design to fit any size wrist(which is really nice because my wrists and hands are big).  It has 4 dangly charms, a heart that has the american flag on one side and "made in the USA" on the other side, a cancer ribbon, a charm that says hope for the cure and a pink double bead charm.

I wear it pretty much everyday and haven't had any issues with it tarnishing or turning my wrist green.  I think it is a cute bracelet and I get so many compliments on it.  I absolutely recommend this bracelet, there are so many cancer's you can choose from for your awareness(I love that about it).

**I did receive this at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion.  Compensation of any kind is never accepted in exchange for a positive review. All opinions expressed are my own and not edited by any companies mentioned.**
summary: Bringing Awareness With This Cute Bracelet!

This is a really nice bracelet, & looks great whether used for meditation/prayer or just for looks.  As another reviewer stated, it is a bit large for a smaller wrist & hand.  The bracelet's well-made, & the beads are hefty.  The beads are much larger than the beads on the multi-layered mala prayer bead bracelets.  I find the beads on this bracelet to be much easier to use for meditation/prayer.  If you look carefully at the obsidian beads in the bright sunlight, you can see greys & greens etc, making the bracelet even more interesting.  My tiger eye beads are not nearly as red as the picture; mine are more brownish.  I was really hoping for the red colouring like in the picture, so that was a little disappointing.  The dragon bead is larger than the obsidian & tiger eye beads.  The dragon is engraved & painted a shiny gold.  There are some parts, like the spikes on the back of the head & some of the toes, where it looks as if it was painted on the bead without the engraving.  If those parts are indeed engraved, it's not very obvious compared to the other parts of the dragon's body.  The dragon's head on my bracelet is much different from the picture.  The dragon in the picture has thick, strong jaws.  My dragon has a round cheek & a very thin jaws, which are open with a thin line of a tongue sticking out.  Also, on my bead & not shown on the picture, my dragon bead has a golden circle between the dragons head & tail, so it looks like the dragon's chasing the moon/sun or a golden ball.  Even though my dragon's not exactly like the one pictured, I still like it.  Perhaps it's hand-engraved rather than mass produced, making each bracelet unique.  Despite the difference in the colouring of the tiger eye beads, I would recommend this bracelet to anyone looking for this type of bracelet.

I don't think it's much of a concern but the bracelet is larger than I expected it to be which is not necessarily a bad thing since it doesn't get to the point where it falls off or anything; it sits nice in my hand. It just changes the dynamic of how it looks and feels.

All in all, I am very pleased with the product which I definitely recommend to anyone who's looking for something like this.

I love Rose Gold Jewelry and the Plating on this Rose Gold and Crystal Bow Pendant Necklace by SmitCo is flawless.
The Sparkling Crystals on this lovely Pendant are Pin Set, not glued, so I have no worries of them becoming loose and falling out.
Each Delicate Crystal is Multi Faceted to Reflect the Light beautifully!
The combination of the 15" Rose Gold Plated Link Chain and 1" wide x 1/2" long Crystal Bow Pendant allows it to rest perfectly at 2" below my neckline when the Lobster Claw Clasp is attached to the link nearest the chain.
I love that SmitCo has designed the Chain with an 18 link Extender, so I am able to adjust the position of this Stunning Crystal Bow Pendant according to my outfit's neckline.
I also appreciate that SmitCo uses High Quality Jump Rings to securely attach the Pendant and Clasp to the Chain.
This is an Extremely Stunning Rose Gold and Crystal Bow Pendant Necklace for the under $15 asking price and I am blessed to have received it in exchange for testing and providing my unbiased review!
As with all of their Jewelry Items, SmitCo shipped my necklace in a very nice Gift Box. My box was a pretty blue color with a tied ribbon already attached, so it was ready for gifting upon  it's arrival.
Giving this Delightful Rose Gold and Crystal Bow Pendant a Well Deserved 5 Star rating is easy. Deciding whether to keep it for myself or gift it to a loved one is going to be more difficult than I expected.
summary: Extremely Stunning Rose Gold and Crystal Bow Pendant Necklace for under $15!!

reviewText: A very pretty necklace that came packaged beautifully as well. It was a gift and was all ready to go when we got it.

This Rose Gold Heart Necklace with Crystals by SmitCo LLC is a very Beautiful and Unique Necklace!
The Dainty Pendant is made up of Two Separate Portions.
The Left Side is a Solid Rose Gold Plated Alloy Metal Piece which is Curved in the Shape of the Outside of the Heart.
The Right Side contains 28 Multi-Faceted 1/16"  Rhinestone Crystals which have been Pin Set to Secure them into the Rose Gold Plated Alloy Metal Base.  The Reverse side of this portion shows the Tiny Pin Holes where the Crystals have been lovingly set into place.
When the Two Portions Nest Together, they form a Stunning and Sparkling 1/2" Pendant.
Each Separate Piece is Strung by an Opening onto a Delicate, but Sturdy 15" Rose Gold Plated Link Chain.
The Chain offers a Lobster Claw Clasp on one end and a 19 Link Extender on the other.
Gifting this Exquisite Rose Gold Plated Heart Necklace is a wonderful way to show the woman or young lady you hold close to your heart how grateful you are that they are in your life.
I received mine in exchange for my unbiased review and I will be gifting it to my sister who was there for me when I was going through some difficult times and needed her support the most.
As SmitCo LLC shipped it in a Very Pretty Gift Box, complete with Satin Ribbon and Bow attached to the box top, all I need to do is write the card which will accompany the gift.
A+++ Recommendation!
summary: This Rose Gold Heart Necklace with Crystals by SmitCo LLC is a very Beautiful and Unique Necklace!

reviewText: What a great top! It is one of my favorite additions to my wardrobe. It's a perfect staple piece because it can be worn with so many types of outfits.. The length makes it wearable with leggings, but it also pairs well with jeans, pants or a skirt. It would work well under the coat sweaters that are popular this year as well. The material is soft and thin. It feels great on your skin and is thin enough to layer, but thick enough that it isn't see through. Although it got a little wrinkled while shipping, it is a fairly wrinkle free material that makes it great for travel. The only slight down side is that the top of the sleeves is slightly restricting. If you have fairly large arms, it may not work for you. Overall an awesome top that you will be glad to have as a wardrobe staple. I received this top at a discounted price in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion and review.

This Women's Fashion Solid Color Long Sleeves Maya Blouse is absolutely beautiful. It has such a lovely fit and feels amazing on your skin. It's very well sewn and well crafted. it's made of 96% viscose and 4% spandex. It has a curvy cut and it flares at the bottom, it's long enough to cover your bottom. I chose a 3X in Black because I wanted it to flow and that is exactly what i got and i love it. You can pair this up with some nice leggings and a nice pair of shoes. Add a pretty accessory or an infinity scarf and you are dressed and ready to go. The material is very soft and silly and flows as you walk. it's such a flattering blouse and I am going to be wearing this many times. it's the type of blouse that can be used with many looks, you can put on a short vest or blazer and even wear it with a pencil type skirt. Make sure you only hand wash it in cold water, if you have a lighter color, do not use bleach, then hang dry, ironing is not recommended. This blouse would make an amazing gift for the Holidays and I highly recommend it. Disclaimer: I received this product at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. All opinions are 100% my own.

reviewText: This shirt is so comfortable! I love the length as well! I wear an L cup size and it's really difficult, even in plus size clothing to find shirts that are long enough to make up for my excess in the front. This shirt is light, airy and stretchy. I'm obviously not the best model for a beautiful shirt like this, but I feel it's good for people to see the good, bad and the ugly with a product and maybe someone has a body type similar to mine and I may have helped them feel fabulous. I can only hope! Please, no judgey comments though, it's hard enough for me to post this! Back to the shirt... I just love how the bottom tapers out and doesn't stick to my midsection. Sometimes when I get more form fitting shirts, my waistline can get lost behind the girls, so having it not be fitted in the stomach area, really helps mask their size a little bit. The arms also feel nice and stretchy and the threading around the armpit and wrist aren't really tight, so you can easily roll up your sleeves and make a different look out of it! I received this shirt at a discounted price in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion.

reviewText:
The dress did fit me, but it was just not for me. The dress is very very very very heavy. I would not wear this in the summer, or ever. You will struggle to walk if you decide to wear this.

Also, it outlined everything on my backside, which is a no-no for me.

I bought this dresss in a size medium, at 8 months pregnant weighing 145lbs 5'3. It fit perfect, not too snug.. the dress was a little long but given that most of my stilettos are 5+ inches I had no issue.  Received many compliments, would purchase again.

This dress is perfect! I ordered a size Medium and it fit like a glove. I am 5'8" and weigh 155#. It is perfect with heels. I had to return because it came the day after my event, so I returned it. I will reorder this exact dress again for my next formal event.
My daughter wore this to the Army ball... it was beautiful.. very happy

Ive worn the dress once for an event and it looked pretty good and held up nicely! The dress quality itself is decent. As others have said, its not lined, and the hem is not surged. The dress is very heavy, so I feel nervous hanging it in the closet as the straps seem like they may be too flimsy to hold the weight of the dress when not wearing it. I hope for future wears that the straps will continue to do their job, and might reinforce them just to be sure that I don't have a wardrobe malfunction.

Im 55 (and wearing 1.5 inch heels in my picture) and my measurements are as follows:
Bust: 38
Underbust: 33
Waist: 28
Hips: 39.5
Inseam: 28

Bra size: 34DD
Shirt size: Medium to Large
Pant size: 8-10 or 30-32
Dress size: 8-10

I bought a large based on the measurements and comments of other reviewers, as I didn't want it to be too small (especially considering my larger hips). However, in retrospect, the material has so much give that I think a medium may have fit around my waist better. Although the dress fits and looks nice, it doesnt fit snuggly around my waist at all. Additionally, the dress was too long, but I was expecting that. Because the hem wasn't surged anyway, I didn't feel bad using a seam ripper to carefully detach the bottom three bandages. After this super easy hem job, the length was perfect and I was still happy with how the shape of the bottom of the dress turned out.
Very pretty dress. Fit was snug but manageable.  The issue with the dress was one layer of bandage was not sewn well and unraveled at the seam as the night went on.
summary: Very pretty dress. Fit was snug but manageable

reviewText:
I initially ordered the red in size large and it was snug. I exchanged it for the blue in an extra large and loved it. The dress is stunning! I wore it to a wedding and it ripped where the fishtail attaches to the rest of the dress but for the  price and the quality of the fabric I wasn't upset.  And because of its stretchiness it was impossible to see the tears while I was wearing it.

The blue is gorgeois!  Its easier to see the true color of the dress in the second photo which also shows the holes.

With all that said, considering price and fabric quality, I recommend this dress.
Beautiful dress! I loved it just needed something shorter. Perfect for women with curves! Stretchy and comfortable fabric.
Do not buy this dress. It weighs about 15 pounds. It also came with 2 holes in it at the top wear the straps are. Even without the holes, this dress is so heavy!

I am SO thrilled with this dress. I'm 5'10, 140 lbs and ordered a size small. I usually wear an x-small/small or a 0/2. This is a true bandage dress so i decided on the small. It fits PERFECTLY. I'll be able to wear a pair of 3-4 inch heels with it because the stretch in the dress allowed me to pull it to be longer or shorter. It looks expensive and feels very high quality. Seriously so incredibly thrilled with this. I usually have a hard time with dresses but this one is perfect. Highly recommend.
Love the material and the dress.
This is a beautiful dress, the quality is great, heavy material but very bearable. I ordered a XL and it fit like a glove.

In these photos it is not completely closed since I did not reach the zipper. The dress fits perfect to the body and is comfortable. I am 5 '6 "tall and 156 weight. I normally wear 34B size medium blouse and 8 pants, small waist but wide hips and big back and the size Medium fits perfect. I'm in love with this dress!

reviewText: I was nervous about ordering online. Also nervous because the customer pictures were of girls more petite than me, but I wanted to take a chance and try standing out a little at our Playhouse fundraising gala. The package came yesterday and the dress is gorgeous! Heavy fabric with cross pleats in just the right spots. I was nervous about the size of the breast area as it looked like it would be much too small, but it's absolutely perfect! I will still be wearing some shape wear just to smooth out my lines a bit, but the dress was actually much more forgiving than I expected. The heavier bandage fabric actually helps smooth you out a bit itself. And it's the only thing I've ever considered going braless in (36D) because the way the fabric holds the girls is actually fairly sturdy. Very pleased. Will post pics after the gala.

Well well, this dress is Fabulous.  I was a complete show stopper.  Fit every curve and it was super long.  I want this in yellow.  Please make a bright yellow.  I got so many compliments.  I went to a gala.  I am 5'8 and weigh 152 lbs.  Super long.  My best friend loved it so much she order one yesterday.  I will add a photo shortly.

As a child of the 90's I have very fond memories of many things that were popular during that era. One of my most prized collections was of these little tattoo style choker necklaces that you could find for a quarter in pretty much in store or restaurant's little prize and candy machines. I had several of the black ones but also had a rainbow one and a few other random colors. Some even had beads integrated inside the loops! These little necklaces bring back so many good memories for me of sharing and trading them with my best friends back in middle school. I recall trying to find some a few years ago and being disappointed that no one seemed to carry them anymore. I am thrilled to have found these on Amazon and can't wait to show all my friends and hear them tell their flashback stories! :)
*** I received this product in exchange for my HONEST and UNBIASED review. All opinions are my own. ***

Edit: the wallet was very nice while it stayed together, but I do wish it lasted longer. Inner parts became worn quicker than I had hoped, but what made me give up and now needing to buy a new wallet is that yesterday, the zipper for the change zipped right off when I was closing it. The change is now permanently zipped no matter how hard I try to put the zipper back on (where  glue or something had become undone); however once it was half on the zipper would not completely unzip. 5 stars for initial quality but 3 stars because of how long it lasted :/

reviewText: On the left shoe, there were two stained yellow spots.

I love these, I had the previous iteration (or maybe two earlier?) and finally wore them out after several years. They are definitely a light-weight training shoe so I wouldn't get them if you are going to be doing a lot of running. But this also makes them extremely comfortable, I hadn't realized how hot running shoes made my feet until I switched to these. Good support and my feet stay cool all day, also noticeably light but well-made and long lasting.

I have worn them hiking in a pinch but don't really recommend it because the material is mesh-like and will let a lot of dirt in. But if you mainly take cardio classes and/or do weight training or just need something to wear around town look no further.

Super light-weight, decent arch support (mine is higher than average).  I was pleasantly surprised by the sole/tread on these for my circuit training classes, as I couldn't really tell by online pics.  Also pleasantly surprised that these ran ever so slightly bigger than Nike running shoes I use to wear 15+years ago - I always wore one to 1.5 sizes larger in their "Hurache's"/running shoes, so I was really worried my size 6 would be too small - there is actually more toe room in these shoes than any other size 6 shoe I own (athletic, heel, boot).  But it is the correct amount of room from big toe to edge of shoe for me (an inch or less, I don't want my big toe being jammed into edge of shoe when lunging, jumping, etc.).  Shoes arrived with an odd yellowish color on side of one shoe, but no damage to box, paper lining etc - I was happy that a clorox wipe easily cleaned the shoe and did not discolor any further.  I am very happy and highly recommend, although I have only worked out it once!
summary: Super light-weight, nice tread and arch support - love them so far!

They look good with just about anything, and are comfortable for most situations.
With the exception of running (for which I use proper Mizuno running sneakers with an arch-support insole), these sneakers are my go-to.
If I could, I'd take away a 1/2 star for arch support - I have a slightly wider front of the foot and arches that are a little on the high side, so I do look for a good under the foot fit. I could probably tie the laces differently or put in an insole(they're pretty expensive), but as is, when I did a zumba class in these, my arch began to twinge :(
However, this is overall an awesome shoe that I will continue to stick with for going out, day to day walking, and for training and gym use (with the exception of running and zumba (although hip-hop was fine). The shoes have a great flexibility to them and don't look "dirty" easily. My previous pair of flex supreme TR 3s have lasted for a good 2 years and are just now on the verge of being worn out. This is the optimal sneaker that is flexible in more ways than one: from pointing you toes to leg-pressing, from gym use to shopping to adding a sporty edge to a dressy night out, the flex has it all.

I am a recess aide and on my feet all day long. I tried these shoes on in the store before purchasing them on Amazon. They are very lightweight and comfortable. I was surprised how great they felt. I haven't had a pair of Nikes since Nike shoxs came out. They are so much more lightweight than those. I wore them an entire day the first day and had no problems. The second day; however, I got a pain in my hip to the point where I started limping. As soon as I got home and took them off, the pain was gone the rest of the evening. I'm only 30 by the way. Nothing else in my daily routine changed except wearing these shoes two days in a row. I don't understand why it would make my hip hurt since they are comfortable on my feet, but I'm sure that was the problem. I wore different shoes today and had no pain. I don't think as much as I am on my feet I will be able to wear them an extended amount of time. I will have to rotate wearing them every other day. For normal wear, I believe, people will be fine. I am literally walking or standing six hours a day straight.

**UPDATE: So, initially after wearing them, I had hip pain after wearing them. I don't know if they just needed to be broken in, but I wear them all the time now and have not experienced any pain since the first couple times of wearing them. They are comfortable, and I love them even more now.
